string.text: Survival Guide Vol. 1

It contains tips for survivalism in hostile environments, as well as recipes to craft basic survival-related items such as backpacks, kevlar plates, belt attachments, cooking kits, tents and sleeping bags.
Survival Guide Vol. 2

It contains tips for survivalism in hostile environments, as well as recipes to craft advanced survival-related items such as backpacks, kevlar plates, belt attachments, cooking kits, tents and sleeping bags.
Survival Guide Vol. 3

It contains tips for survivalism in hostile environments, as well as recipes to craft expert survival-related items such as backpacks, kevlar plates, belt attachments, cooking kits, tents and sleeping bags.
Electronics Handbook Vol. 1
This handbook contains tips and blueprints to make electronic boards, chips and blueprints. This could be used to craft basic NVG systems, artefacts detectors and artefacts containers.
Electronics Handbook Vol. 2
This handbook contains tips and blueprints to make electronic boards, chips and blueprints. This could be used to craft advanced NVG systems, artefacts detectors and artefacts containers.
Electronics Handbook Vol. 3
This handbook contains tips and blueprints to make electronic boards, chips and blueprints. This could be used to craft expert NVG systems, artefacts detectors and artefacts containers.
Fundamentals of Guns and Armors Upgrades Vol. 1
This comprehensive book contains tips and blueprints to make basic upgrade systems for guns, armors and helmets.
Fundamentals of Guns and Armors Upgrades Vol. 2
This comprehensive book contains tips and blueprints to make advanced upgrade systems for guns, armors and helmets.
Fundamentals of Guns and Armors Upgrades Vol. 3
This comprehensive book contains tips and blueprints to make expert upgrade systems for guns, armors and helmets.
The Art of Artefacts Fusion Vol. 1

This book contains printed versions of Prof. Sakharov latest publications concerning Artefacts melting and fusion. It displays a handful of recipes for the Artefact Melter to fuse common artefacts into uncommon artefacts.
The Art of Artefacts Fusion Vol. 2

This book contains printed versions of Prof. Sakharov latest publications concerning Artefacts melting and fusion. It displays a handful of recipes for the Artefact Melter to fuse uncommon artefacts into rare artefacts.
The Art of Artefacts Fusion Vol. 3

This book contains printed versions of Prof. Sakharov latest publications concerning Artefacts melting and fusion. It displays a handful of recipes for the Artefact Melter to fuse rare artefacts into extremely rare and unique artefacts.
Advances in Military Applications: Exoskeletons (Confidential)

This very special and rare issue of "Advances in Military Applications" comprises confidential scientific communications and digests concerning Exoskeletons produced by the leaders of military solutions development. These precious information will certainly allow you to repair the specific exoskeletons and exohelmets found in the Zone.
